skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I build responsive, accessible web interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React to create fast, clean user experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I develop secure, scalable server-side systems using Node.js, Express, and databases like MongoDB and MySQL.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I design intuitive and engaging user experiences with Figma, focusing on usability, user flow, and modern interface aesthetics.

skills.title: Video Editing
skills.description: I edit videos using VN, CapCut, and DaVinci Resolve to create impactful, engaging content for social media and marketing.

portfolio.title: Zerotha Clone
portfolio.description: A professional Zerodha clone built with React Router, featuring a responsive and intuitive real-time trading interface UI.

portfolio.title: Web Calculator
portfolio.description: A responsive web calculator built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to perform essential arithmetic operations efficiently.

portfolio.title: Spotify UI Clone
portfolio.description: A visually appealing Spotify clone designed using HTML and CSS, replicating the core layout and user interface of the original app.

portfolio.title: AirBnb Clone
portfolio.description: A full-stack Airbnb clone featuring listings, booking flow, and user authentication. Currently under development.
